title: Domain 1.5: Given a scenario, use the appropriate Windows settings.
content:
⚙️ Windows Settings Categories

  • 🕓 Time and Language: Set date/time, region, language packs, keyboard layouts, and speech preferences.
  • 🔄 Update and Security: Access Windows Update, troubleshooters, backup & restore, antivirus settings, and system recovery tools.
  • 🎨 Personalization: Customize wallpaper, themes, lock screen, fonts, colors, and Start menu behavior.
  • 📱 Apps: Manage installed applications, optional features, default app assignments, and startup behavior.
  • 🔒 Privacy: Control access to location, camera, microphone, diagnostics data, and app-specific permissions.
  • 🖥️ System: Adjust display settings, sound, notifications, power & sleep, storage, and view system information.
  • 🖧 Network and Internet: Configure Wi-Fi, Ethernet, VPN, proxy settings, and monitor data usage.
  • 🖨️ Devices: Manage printers, scanners, Bluetooth devices, typing options, and connected peripherals.
  • 🎮 Gaming: Settings for Game Bar, Game Mode, and Xbox networking features for optimized performance.
  • 👤 Accounts: Handle user accounts, sign-in options (e.g., password, PIN, biometrics), sync settings, and access to work/school accounts.
